commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Okay, guys! Let's get to practicing!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* You sure are pumped up today, Kanata.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Not as much as I am!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yes, yes. You're both great.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, where's Ai?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Ai left early.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?! Why?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Her sister is being admitted to the hospital, apparently.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I didn't know that... Do you think she's okay?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I don't know the details, unfortunately.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Y-Yeah, that makes sense.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I hope Ai is all right. Do you think she's really worried?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sure she's worried. If I were in her shoes... I'm scared just imagining it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, guys? When club time is over...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm home.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Welcome home, Ai!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Wha?! Huh?! Wh-Why are you all at my house?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We were worried about you, Ai. Is Misato gonna be okay?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh man, you scared me. My sister's fine. She's just in the hospital for some tests.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, really?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Sorry if I gave you the wrong idea. I should've explained it more.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you sure?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I wouldn't lie to you, silly!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I feel kinda bad. You were worried about me? But seriously, she's just in for some tests this time. We'll be fine!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I see... Thank goodness!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Thanks for coming all the way here, you guys.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: You don't have to thank us. We care about you, Ai!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Wow. I'm really lucky to have such good friends!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I see that your family runs the monjayaki place here, Ai.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You look like you want a monjayaki, Kasukasu! I can tell! Not many can resist the temptation when they smell our delicious sauce.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's Kasumin, not Kasukasu!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But you're right, that sauce smells really good.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'll treat you guys, since you came all this way. Order whatever you like!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: What?! Are you sure?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: E-Emma! You should hold yourself back a little...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Don't be silly, Karin! Good friends like us shouldn't hold back from each other! Don't you want some of my family's tasty monjayaki?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Of course I do!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Then eat up! I'll make you my special recipe!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You're an angel!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Aww, c'mon. Don't go overboard by calling me an angel just because I'm serving you some monjayaki!
